text: I don't think this is currently possible, also the local-development channel is not the correct channel
Well while that is a solution, it’s still manual and cumbersome when a lot of changes has to be pushed, reviewed and tested :disappointed:
Anyway, i found that adding a parameter and not changing it takes us back to 1-3 refreshes, so at least we’re back at where we started. Thanks
I think, the official way is to use `?hsDebug=true`. That should avoid the caches, but I find it not as quick as above mentioned
